title: Plan Offshore Crane Lift
description: An offshore logistics coordinator plans a critical crane lift to move a large piece of equipment from a supply boat to the platform deck.

tasks.description: Create a lift plan, specifying the equipment to be lifted, its weight, and the start and end locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: A draft lift plan is created in the system.

tasks.description: Check the weather forecast, specifically wind speed and sea state, to ensure the lift can be performed safely.
tasks.expected_outcome: The forecast is checked and confirms conditions are within safe limits for the planned time.

tasks.description: Finalize and issue the lift plan for approval by the offshore installation manager and crane operator.
tasks.expected_outcome: The plan is submitted for final approval before the operation begins.
